src:
Cantiknya Nathalia Felix, Pacar Douglas Costa yang Gosipnya Pernah Dekati Neymar
07 Nov 2019, 11:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus sukses membekuk Lokomotiv Moscow dengan skor 2-1 dalam lanjutan Matchday 4 Liga Champions 2019-2020, Kamis (7/11/2019) di Lokomotiv Stadium. Douglas Costa menjadi penentu kemenangan Bianconeri lewat golnya pada menit 90+3'.
Costa pun dianggap sebagai pahlawan kemenangan dramatis Bianconeri di kandang Lokomotiv Moscow. Di balik performa gemilang Costa dalam laga tersebut ternyata ada sosok yang membuat tampil oke. Sosok tersebut ialah bernama Nathalia Felix.
Hal tersebut terlihat saat model asal Brasil itu mengunggah Instagram Story sedang menonton pertandingan tersebut di tribun penonton. Costa dan Nathalia mulai berpacaran sejak September 2019.
Nama Nathalia mulai dikenal publik setelah sempat digosipkan selingkuh dengan penyerang Paris Saint Germain, Neymar. Melansir Bola.com, berikut tujuh potret memesona Nathalia Felix, kekasih Douglas Costa yang sempat digosipkan selingkuh dengan Neymar.
text:
The beauty of Nathalia Felix, Douglas Costa's girlfriend whose gossip ever approached Neymar
Nov 7 2019, 11:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus successfully arrested Lokomotiv Moscow with a score of 2-1 in Matchday 4 Champions League 2019-2020 on Thursday (7/11/2019) at Lokomotiv Stadium. Douglas Costa was the decisive winner of the Bianconeri through his goal in the 90 + 3 'minute.
Costa was considered the hero of the dramatic Bianconeri victory at home to Lokomotiv Moscow. Behind Costa's glorious performance in the match turned out to be a figure who made it look okay. The figure is named Nathalia Felix.
This can be seen when the Brazilian model uploads Instagram Story watching the match in the stands. Costa and Nathalia started dating since September 2019.
Nathalia's name began to be known to the public after being rumored having an affair with Paris Saint Germain's attacker, Neymar. Launch Bola.com, here are seven charming portraits of Nathalia Felix, Douglas Costa's lover who was rumored having an affair with Neymar.
